title: Embroidered Picture, 1840
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, knot, stem and speckling stitches on plain weave foundation
provenance: Collector's note: "made by a young lady in Madison, New Jersey."
description: Picture illustrating the story of "The Lady of the Lake" by Sir Walter Scott (1771-1832). The faces, lake and sky are painted; the tree trunks in the foreground are embroidered in chenille yarns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 1840. Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, knot, stem and speckling stitches on plain weave foundation. 1975-86-21.
